arts.ttl: Eddie the Eagle! Palace turn tables on Liverpool in exhilarating late win
arts.sum: Liverpool's perfect start to the 2025-26 Premier League season comes to an end in the most extraordinary circumstances as Crystal Palace leave it incredibly late to triumph 2-1 over the Reds at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 2-1 Liverpool: Eddie Nketiah nets 97th-minute winner to inflict first defeat of the season on Premier League champions as Eagles extend unbeaten run to 18 MATCHES
arts.sum: DOMINIC KING: Try as they might, the Selhurst Park stewards were fighting a losing battle. Though they asked the locals to start heading for the exits, nobody was listening

arts.ttl: Late Eddie Nketiah winner sees Crystal Palace end Liverpoolâ€™s unbeaten start
arts.sum: The goal came shortly after Federico Chiesa had equalised for the champions.

arts.ttl: Nketiah strikes in 97th minute as Palace stun Liverpool
arts.sum: Eddie Nketiah scored a stunning 97th-minute winner as Crystal Palace beat Liverpool again to go second in the Premier League to the delight of a roaring home crowd at Selhurst Park.

arts.ttl: BREAKING: Liverpool handed referee verdict after late drama vs Crystal Palace
arts.sum: A new referee verdict has been issued after two late goals in Liverpool's dramatic Premier League clash with Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park

arts.sum: Eddie Nketiah scored a stoppage-time winner to give unbeaten Crystal Palace a 2-1 victory over leaders Liverpool

arts.ttl: Why Arne Slot was booked during Crystal Palace vs Liverpool as Mikel Arteta sent warning
arts.sum: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot was booked in the game against Crystal Palace for breaching a rule that Arsenal head coach Mikel Arteta is often guilty of breaking

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace v Liverpool stopped after medical emergency
arts.sum: The Premier League match was delayed for seven minutes after the incident in the stands at Selhurst Park
